item.description:
The Capital Classics Shakespeare Festival
presents
THE TEMPEST
by William Shakespeare

Tickets: 231.5555 or Online or at the door. It also looks like you can get the tickets the day of the event. The performance is rain or shine (they have an indoor theater if it rains.

www.tickets.sjc.edu

Bring lawns chairs, blankets, picnic baskets!
The Elizabethan Consort
will perform traditional madrigals on the grounds
one-half hour before curtain and during intermission.

Rain Location: Hoffman Auditorium

This starts at 5:30 pm. Let's meet between 5 and 5:15 by the tickets booth.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be where you buy tickets between 5 and 5:15. My cell phone is 203-812-0705 if you can't find me.
item.name: Shakespeare under the Stars: The Tempest
